overview: The death-defying stunts continue in this third installment of the freestyle ATV franchise. Captured in stunning HD -- often from the vantage point of a helicopter -- this slick and exciting collection puts you right in the middle of the action. A hard-core soundtrack accompanies the proceedings, which includes appearances by Jon Guetter, Derek Guetter, Steve Weissinger, Ben Bettis, Taylor Moles, August and Xander Goebel, Austin Wilson and Caleb Moore.
title: The Fallout: Volume 3
